title: Dispute a Minibar Charge on Folio
description: A guest checking out is disputing a charge for a minibar item they claim they did not consume.

tasks.description: Retrieve the guest's folio using their name or room number.
Identify the specific minibar charge being disputed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the charge for '$8 - Sparkling Water'.

tasks.description: As a gesture of goodwill, remove the disputed charge from the guest's folio.
